instruction: Reply to the following email as a company representative
input:
Hi, 

I just placed an order for a pair of shoes from your store, but it hasn't arrived yet. Could you let me know when it will arrive?

Thanks
output:
Dear customer,

Thank you for your purchase from our store! We are sorry for the delay in shipping your order and we will look into it. Please allow us some time to investigate the cause of the delay and we will get back to you as soon as possible with an update and deliver the order as soon as we can. 

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

Sincerely, 
Company Name
